text: James Adam "Jim" Belushi (born June 15, 1954) is an Albanian-American actor, comedian, singer and musician. He played James "Jim" Orenthal in the series According to Jim. ==Personal life== He is John Belushi's younger brother. ==References== == Other websites == * * Category:1954 births Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Albanian actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stand-up comedians Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from Chicago Category:Living people
title: Jim Belushi
